def.dt: :someone or something (such as a team or an animal) that has won a contest or competition especially in sports tennis champions the heavyweight boxing champion of the world Our team will play the defending/reigning/current champions next week. the newly crowned national/world/Olympic champions often used before another noun a champion boxer/skier/swimmer champion racehorses
:someone who fights or speaks publicly in support of a person, belief, cause, etc. He was a champion for the working classes. often + of She was a lawyer and a champion of children's rights.
:to fight or speak publicly in support of (a person, belief, cause, etc.) She is a lawyer who champions children's rights. Our senator championed the idea of lowering taxes.
